name: Galaxy Side Table
description: The sculptural and airy Galaxy Side Table/Stool can be used both ways. This is a dramatic piece that showcases the incredible craftsmanship of KIFU PARIS. Handmade, featuring an Antique Natural Shagreen surface and bronze-patina brass legs. Made in Philippines. All shagreen-covered items should be kept out of direct sunlight. Color variants may occur on the stingray and other exotic finishes, showcasing the Parisian label's commitment to creating authentic luxurious products using natural components.
